narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Adult Day Health, Inc. is a Custodial Care Facility provider based in Baltimore, MD. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $11.9M in Medicaid payments across 155K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $11.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
